mutants.code:
def by_length(arr):
    words = ['', 'Two', 'Three', 'Four', 'Five', 'Six', 'Seven', 'Eight', 'Nine']
    one_to_nine = [x for x in arr if 1 <= x <= 9]
    one_to_nine.sort(reverse=True)
    return [words[num - 1] for num in one_to_nine]
